alert.note: Alert for Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:43PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Waukesha County through 830 PM CDT... At 742 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hartland, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waukesha, Wauwatosa, New Berlin, Brookfield, Menomonee Falls, Pewaukee, Sussex, Hartland, Delafield, Elm Grove, Wales, Okauchee Lake, Oconomowoc, Lisbon, Merton, Butler, Lannon, Nashotah, Oconomowoc Lake and Chenequa. People attending Village of Elm Grove Park , and The New Berlin 4th of July Festival should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
